      • testLongLivedScan

        public void testLongLivedScan()
                       throws Exception
        Tests keeping a HBase scanner alive for long periods of time. Each call to next() should reset the ConnectionCache timeout for the scanner's connection.
        Throws:
        Exception - if starting the servlet container or disabling or truncating the table fails
